ygData.subject: Re: Solusek bard quest items...
ygData.msgSnippet: Wow...  wonder if they changed something in the patch, or if the random number generator is really that clumpy.  I ve killed at least 4 dozen champions now,
ygData.messageBody:
Wow... wonder if they changed something in the patch, or if the random number generator is
really that clumpy. I've killed at least 4 dozen champions now, and nothing. Mages seem really
rare, only see 4 the whole time I've been there.. and no boots.

Laluni sighs, clearly disappointed.

kim@... wrote:

> From: <kim@...>
>
> On Thu, 4 Nov 1999, Steven S. Klug wrote:
> >
> > Well hmm... Can we hear from some people that DID find the quest items? Is there anything
> > special you did? And how long did it take?
>
> Took about 2 hours. The first 10 or so champions didn't have
> the vambraces. We got three in the next 8, while waiting for
> the boots from a mage. Finally got the boots after about 8
> mages. The king never showed up while we were doing this.
> Singe showed up three times, but other groups nabbed him
> before us.
>
> --
> John H. Kim
> kim@...
>
> > Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to toren@... with the subject lol.

--
Steven S. Klug
sklug@...
